title: Print, "Citibank Statement Design", ca. 1975
description: Citibank ready credit checking statement and payment form, printed once on single page. Citibank logo in blue at top right with blue line above. Below grey box with black text subdivided into five different registers for different information. Top and bottom registers have orange heading bar, middle three have black. At bottom removable payment ticket with black text withCitibank logo in blue at top right with blue line above.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Citibank Statement Design", ca. 1975.
ca. 1975. Photo offset lithograph. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-69.
